content.rendered:
U SHAPE: 

Rise & Shine’s Travel Neck pillows have the unique U shape design to keep your neck, shoulder and spine aligned to eliminate pain while traveling. The Neck pillow also come with the size adjustable strap which will be perfect for all.

 

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these memory foam Neck pillows bring you the most comfortable Journey. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-elastic memory foam.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL: 

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the pillow to become hard in winters.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Neck & Shoulder pain relief
  • Greater air flow & Refreshing Sleep
  • Relief from Sleep problems during travelling
  • Invented by “NASA”
  • Total Value for Money

 

OUTER COVER: 

We provide a premium cotton Velvet fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent. The Neck pillow also comes with the size adjustable strap which will be perfect for all.

 

WE ASSURE: 

We have tested our pillows in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our pillows are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

Our Pillows will be tightly rolled packed, kindly cut the plastic carefully and then enjoy your pillow coming back to its original shape within 2-4 Hours. Memory Foam pillows may contain air bubbles which may seem as if foam has holes but they are part of moulded foam and they do not affect the quality of the pillow.

excerpt.rendered: When it is about comfortable traveling you should carry Rise & Shine’s Travel Neck pillow with you. Travel Neck pillow prevents our neck from dropping around and aligns our Neck, Spine and shoulder. These pillows will make your journey in flights, trains or car much more comfortable and you will not have a sore or stiff neck at the end of the journey. So just wrap the pillow around your neck and let your Neck & Shoulder muscles relax so that you can enjoy your ride.
